readable.title: 3330333217_1a69497a74
readable.content: A black man in a blue shirt stands next to a black man in a red robe . A man wearing a red cloth stands next to a man wearing a blue cloth . Black men in poor neighborhood . Two Africans in red and blue shawls pose for a picture outside a barber shop . Two people , one in blue and one in red , stand in front of a building .
